item.title: 降价促进销售，中国电动汽车制造商不惧行业低迷
item.description: 行业数据显示，尽管乘用车整体市场的交付量预计将出现萎缩，但降价和新车型帮助包括比亚迪公司和新奥公司在内的中国电动汽车制造商在5月份继续保持销量增长。【原文：Price cuts and new models helped Chinese electric vehicle makers, including BYD Co. and Nio Inc., continue to grow sales in May even as the overall market for passenger cars is expected to see deliveries shrink, industry data showed.】

item.title: 中国有色矿业集团希望在阿根廷收购更多锂矿项目
item.description: 中国电池组件制造商和特斯拉公司供应商中研新材股份有限公司（CNGR Advanced Material Co.【原文：CNGR Advanced Material Co., a Chinese battery-component maker and Tesla Inc. supplier, is looking to buy major stakes in Argentina brine deposits to extend its foray into the lithium-rich region as it builds its own supply chain outside the Asian nation.】

item.title: 克鲁格曼称中国 "奇怪地不愿 "扩大需求
item.description: 诺贝尔经济学奖得主保罗-克鲁格曼认为，中国领导人 "奇怪地不愿意 "用更多的政府支出来支持消费需求，而不是生产。【原文：China’s leaders are “bizarrely unwilling” to use more government spending to support consumer demand instead of production, according to Nobel laureate in economics Paul Krugman.】

item.title: 随着澳大利亚银行的扩张，巴伦乔伊开设阿布扎比办事处
item.description: 澳大利亚投资银行 Barrenjoey 开始在阿布扎比提供固定收益销售和交易服务，这标志着其首个海外办事处的成立。【原文：Barrenjoey, an Australian investment bank, began offering fixed-income sales and trading services in Abu Dhabi in an expansion that marks the opening of its first overseas office.】

item.title: 印尼建筑商力宝回购债券面临投资者考验
item.description: 印尼建筑商 PT Lippo Karawaci 回购美元债券的计划将在周一成为焦点，因为借贷成本的上升挤压了亚洲开发商的资金。【原文：A plan by Indonesian builder PT Lippo Karawaci to repurchase its dollar bonds will be in focus on Monday as elevated borrowing costs squeeze the finances of developers in Asia.】

item.title: 以下是墨西哥周日大选中值得关注的资产
item.description: 投资者对墨西哥总统大选充满期待，认为执政党候选人克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆（Claudia Sheinbaum）将会获胜，但国会选举的意外结果可能会加剧墨西哥资产的波动。【原文：Investors are going into Mexico’s presidential election fully expecting a win by ruling party candidate Claudia Sheinbaum, but surprise outcomes to congressional races could fuel volatility in Mexican assets.】

item.title: 民调预测莫迪将以压倒性优势获胜，印度股票期货大涨
item.description: 出口民调显示，印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪领导的执政党在周六结束的大选中大获全胜，印度股票期货随之大涨。【原文：India’s stock futures jumped after exit polls indicated a resounding victory for Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s ruling party in general elections that concluded Saturday.】

item.title: 前高盛高管加入马云支持的东京 PE 公司
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：A former Goldman Sachs Group Inc. executive in Japan is joining a private equity firm backed by Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. founder Jack Ma, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: OneWater 正在洽谈收购竞争对手游艇经销商 MarineMax
item.description: 知情人士周日透露，OneWater Marine 公司正在洽谈收购其较大的竞争对手 MarineMax 公司。【原文：OneWater Marine Inc. is in talks to acquire its larger rival MarineMax Inc., people with knowledge of the matter said Sunday.】

item.title: KKR 考虑进军日本私人信贷市场挑战银行
item.description: KKR & Co. 正考虑进入日本的私人信贷市场，为银行贷款提供替代方案。【原文：KKR & Co. is considering entering the private credit market in Japan to provide an alternative to bank loans.】

item.title: 人工智能热吸引 27 亿美元外国资金回流台股
item.description: 在人工智能再度引发乐观情绪的背景下，外国基金在 5 月份结束了对台湾股票两个月的连续抛售。【原文：Foreign funds snapped a two-month selling streak of Taiwanese equities in May amid renewed optimism around artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 东南亚购买澳大利亚肉类的数量创历史新高：部长
item.description: 澳大利亚农业部长穆雷-瓦特（Murray Watt）表示，在亚洲新兴市场对牛羊肉需求激增的推动下，澳大利亚的红肉出口正在创下新纪录。【原文：Australia’s red meat exports are setting records, buoyed by surging demand for beef and sheep in Asian emerging markets, according to Agriculture Minister Murray Watt.】

item.title: 投资者对印度出口民调显示莫迪压倒性胜利的反应
item.description: 2024年5月25日星期六，印度德里，在全国大选第六阶段投票期间，女选民在投票站排队。印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）表示，他领导的印度人民党（Bharatiya Janata Party）已经在下周结束的议会选举中赢得了绝大多数竞选席位，这使他有可能第三次重返执政岗位。彭博社【原文：Women voters stand in line at a polling station during the sixth phase of voting for national elections in Delhi, India, on Saturday, May 25, 2024. Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi said his Bharatiya Janata Party has already won a majority of the seats contested in the parliamentary elections due to end next week, putting him in a position to return to office for a third term. Bloomberg】

item.title: 日本央行加息后，日本邮政缓慢购买最长期限债券
item.description: 日本邮政保险公司（Japan Post Insurance Co.【原文：Japan Post Insurance Co. is holding off from buying most domestic super-long bonds, due to concern that the central bank’s reduction of debt purchases may weigh on the market.】

item.title: 澳大利亚命令与中国有关联的投资者出售稀土股权
item.description: 澳大利亚已下令与中国有关联的裕孝基金（Yuxiao Fund）及其关联公司出售其在稀土矿商北方矿业有限公司（Northern Minerals Ltd.）的股份，这是美国盟友为对抗亚洲国家在关键矿产领域的主导地位所做努力的一部分。【原文：Australia has ordered Chinese-linked Yuxiao Fund and its associates to sell their stakes in rare earths miner Northern Minerals Ltd., part of an effort by US allies to counter the Asian nation’s dominance of critical minerals.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 出口民调显示莫迪获胜。中国在新加坡会议上抨击美国英伟达宣布新的人工智能计划。以下是您今天需要了解的信息。【原文：Exit polls suggest victory for Modi. China slams US at Singapore meeting. Nvidia announces new AI initiatives. Here’s what you need to know today.】

item.title: 投资者称银行是韩国企业改革的主角
item.description: 从伦敦到纽约，投资者都在打赌，在政府的企业改革推动下，韩国银行将继续保持明星业绩。【原文：From London to New York, investors are wagering that South Korean banks will remain star performers thanks to the government’s corporate-reform push.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》称，废弃物管理公司接近以 70 亿美元收购 Stericycle 公司
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》报道，废物管理公司（Waste Management Inc.【原文：Waste Management Inc. is close to a deal to buy medical-waste disposal company Stericycle Inc. for about $7 billion, the Wall Street Journal reported.】

item.title: 亚洲股市早盘收涨，降息押注坚定：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市早盘将跟随上周五的美国股市上涨，因为在央行首选的通胀指标放缓后，美联储降息的预期得到了支持。【原文：Asian stocks are set to gain in early trading, following US peers on Friday, as expectations for Federal Reserve rate cuts were bolstered after the central bank’s preferred measure for inflation eased.】

item.title: 欧佩克+发出计划向市场回流石油的信号后石油下跌
item.description: 在 "欧佩克+"（OPEC+）制定了今年向市场回流部分油桶的计划后，石油跌幅扩大。【原文：Oil extended losses after OPEC+ set out a plan to return some barrels back to the market this year.】

item.title: 百分之七的欧洲企业面临重组压力
item.description: 波士顿咨询公司（Boston Consulting Group）的一份报告显示，受融资成本上升和消费需求减弱的影响，今年每十五家欧洲公司中就有一家面临重组的巨大压力，其中德国、奥地利和北欧公司的压力尤其大。【原文：One in fifteen European companies are facing significant pressure to restructure this year after being hit by higher financing costs and weakening consumer demand, with Germany, Austria and the Nordics particularly under strain, according to a report by Boston Consulting Group.】

item.title: 套利交易抵消 AI 股票流入，台币拉锯战一触即发
item.description: 由于套利交易的力量压倒了台币的股票流入尾风，台币兑美元有望重新测试八年来的低点。【原文：Taiwan’s dollar is poised to retest an eight-year low against the greenback as carry trade forces overpower the currency’s equity inflows tailwind.】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 尽管人们担心铜会短缺，但中国正在证明这种工业金属的供应仍然充足。罗布斯塔咖啡在连续三个月上涨的同时，价格也在剧烈波动。美国石油业又迎来了一笔大收购。【原文：Despite fears of copper shortages, China is proving that there’s still plenty of the industrial metal. Robusta coffee is enduring wild price swings as it chalks up three months of gains. And the US oil industry sees another big acquisition.】

item.title: 中国游客将在国内度假消费近 1 万亿美元
item.description: 据预测，中国游客今年将为内地经济注入创纪录的 6.79 万亿元人民币（9,380 亿美元），首次超过 "大饥荒 "前的水平。【原文：Chinese tourists embarking on adventures closer to home are forecast to pump a record 6.79 trillion yuan ($938 billion) into the mainland economy this year — topping pre-pandemic levels for the first time.】

item.title: 特朗普获胜被视为美联储独立性和债券市场的风险：民意调查
item.description:
受访者预计，如果特朗普获得连任，国债收益率将出现波动

。【原文：

Survey respondents expect a move in Treasury yields if Trump secures a second term

】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行被视为唯一面临加息风险的主要央行
item.description: 据货币市场称，如果通胀率未能放缓，澳大利亚央行今年可能别无选择，只能恢复加息，这将使澳大利亚成为大流行病后几乎已经结束的全球紧缩周期中的一个潜在例外。【原文：Australia’s central bank may have no choice but to resume raising interest rates this year if inflation fails to slow, according to money markets, setting it up as a potential outlier to a post-pandemic global tightening cycle that has all-but ended.】

item.title: 南非非洲人国民大会在选举中获得 40% 的议会席位
item.description: 南非选举委员会周日公布的选举结果显示，执政党非洲人国民大会在 5 月 29 日举行的国民议会选举中获得 159 个席位。【原文：South Africa’s governing African National Congress obtained 159 seats in the nation’s National Assembly in elections held on May 29, according to results announced by the electoral commission on Sunday.】

item.title: 卡塔尔航空公司完成波音和空客大型宽体客机订单
item.description: 据知情人士透露，卡塔尔航空公司（Qatar Airways PJSC）即将就波音公司（Boeing Co.【原文：Qatar Airways PJSC is nearing a decision on a major widebody order split between Boeing Co. and Airbus SE, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 大韩航空计划最早于 7 月订购 30 架波音喷气机
item.description: 波音公司飞机的大买家大韩航空（Korean Air Lines Co.【原文：Korean Air Lines Co., a big buyer of Boeing Co. aircraft, is planning to order up to 30 new jets from the US planemaker as soon as next month.】

item.title: 利雅得航空公司将与更多航空公司深化合作协议
item.description: 利雅得航空公司（Riyadh Air）正在扩大其与全球知名航空公司的合作网络，这家沙特阿拉伯最新成立的航空公司正努力在明年上市前建立全球联系。【原文：Riyadh Air is expanding its network of partnerships with established carriers around the world as Saudi Arabia’s newest airline seeks to build global ties ahead of its market debut next year.】
